definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: All projects should have single windows clearence.
sentences.chinese: 所有项目应该只有一个清关窗口。

sentences.english: Work with the forwarder to ensure the goods entire on time.
sentences.chinese: 和代理公司一起确保进口及时清关及按时送货。

sentences.english: This enables consolidated customs clearance using a single importer of record.
sentences.chinese: 这就可以使用一个进口商记录进行集中式海关清关。

sentences.english: We send you the documents in order that you can clear customs.
sentences.chinese: 我们给你寄去的单据，是为了贵司办理清关等事宜。

sentences.english: Work with gateway for inbound clearance and monitor the shipment transfer to bonded warehouse .
sentences.chinese: 协助口岸处理进库清关工作并监督货物入保税仓库。

sentences.english: Gray clearance of the Chinese textile and apparel trade disorder causes.
sentences.chinese: 灰色清关是中俄纺织品服装贸易秩序混乱的根源。

sentences.english: Also note, Sootang is not responsible for any delays due to custom clearance.
sentences.chinese: 并且，塑唐不对于由于清关所造成的延误事情负责。

sentences.english: Responsible for customs clearance procedure of importing order.
sentences.chinese: 负责进口清关及进口订单的管理。

sentences.english: Import and export trade, freight forwarding clearance is a traditional function.
sentences.chinese: 在进出口贸易中，清关是货运代理的一项传统职能。

sentences.english: CFR term requires the seller to clear the goods for export.
sentences.chinese: 即由卖方负责办理货物的出口清关手续。

sentences.english: Deliver the cleared goods to the consignee.
sentences.chinese: 将清关后的货物交付给收货人。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
to put together an order of goods
